mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record (uid, cid, nid, time) VALUES (#{uid}, #{cid}, #{nid}, #{time})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM record WHERE nid = #{nid} AND uid = #{uid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM record WHERE cid = #{cid} AND uid = #{uid}
mapper.update: UPDATE record SET cid = #{cid}, time = #{time} WHERE uid = #{uid} AND nid = #{nid}
